tool.name: Whippet

param.name: prioritization_layer
param.dialogReference: The invasive plant layer with all neccessary attributes (see below). For attributes that you don't have information for, please create the attribute with values set as Null.

param.name: Scientific
param.dialogReference: Attribute in prioritization layer that specifies the scientific name. These names need to match what is shown in whippet_scores.csv.

param.name: accessibility_score_attribute
param.dialogReference: Attribute with accessibility score (set to Null if don't have determinations)

param.name: patch_size_unit
param.expression: square feet | acre | square meter | hectare
param.dialogReference: unit for patch size, this is used to convert to the unit for the chosen breaks.

param.name: conspecific_breaks
param.expression: conspecifics option 1 (miles) | conspecifics option 2 (miles) | conspecifics option 3 (miles) | conspecifics option 4 (miles)

param.name: population_breaks
param.expression: area option 1 (acres) | area option 2 (acres) | area option 3 (acres)
param.dialogReference: See https://github.com/leffjesh/whippet for more information.

param.name: site_value
param.datatype: Raster Dataset or Raster Layer or Raster Catalog or Feature Layer
param.dialogReference:
Layer with site value scores. This can be a Raster or a Polygon feature class.

See https://github.com/leffjesh/whippet for more information.

param.name: site value_attribute
param.dialogReference:
Attribute in specified site value layer that contains value. Score should be normalized to 10 (polygons) or 1000 (raster).

See https://github.com/leffjesh/whippet for more information.

param.name: streams_layer
param.dialogReference: Layer for streams covering your area of interest.

param.name: streets_layer
param.dialogReference: Layer for streets covering your area of interest. YOu can substitute and/or include trails data here if you feel it is appropriate and should be counted the same as streets.

param.name: mines_layer
param.dialogReference: Layer for mines covering your area of interest.

param.name: vector_breaks
param.expression: distance option 1 (miles) | distance option 2 (miles) | distance option 3 (miles) | distance option 4 (miles)

tool.summary: Python implementation of WHIPPET. See https://github.com/leffjesh/whippet for more information.
